TCEntry.Line0: The vile bandit Rowan was last seen near 101 9'S, 54 59'E.. He is not to be trusted.
TCEntry.Line1: Do what you will with him, but just see that he does not enter our fair city.

TCEntry.Line0: The merchant Madelaine was last seen somewhere outside of Britain and is said to be bringing us some of her finest wares.
TCEntry.Line1: Madelaine was last seen near 87 53'N, 25 27'W. Please see that Madelaine arrives safely.
